scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && echo gravel-model built
scripts.jasmine: jasmine dist/**/*.spec.js && echo gravel-model tests passed
scripts.ln: npm ln @protoboard/river && npm ln && echo gravel-model linked
scripts.test: npm run tslint && npm run jasmine
scripts.tslint: tslint -c ../../tslint.json src/**/*.ts && echo gravel-model tslint passed
